testcase.classname: Login with Valid Credentials and Logout
testcase.name: To Verify the Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launched "https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank" in Browser.....passed And Application base page is displayed with Login Username and Password Fields.passed When User enters Username : "goutham" , Password : "9876543210".............passed And Clicks on the submit button.............................................passed Then User Verifies the application is logged in successfully................passed
